title: General: The provision applicable to stairways shall generally apply to ramps
clause_text: General: The provision applicable to stairways shall generally apply to ramps. A ramp in a hospital shall not be less than 2.25 m wide. In addition, to satisfy the fire-fighting requirements, a ramp shall conform to sub-regulation (7) of Regulation 48
